action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:
ANSWER: your answer
action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows a reception area with a curved wooden counter. Above the counter, there is a wall with the text "STOLL-KEENON-OGDEN" and a circular logo. The floor is tiled, and there is a white column on the left side.

ANSWER: The reception area is designed with a curved wooden counter and a wall displaying the text "STOLL-KEENON-OGDEN" along with a circular logo. The floor is tiled, and there
action.label: response

answer: the reception area is designed with a curved wooden counter and a wall displaying the text "stoll-keenon-ogden" along with a circular logo. the floor is tiled, and there
